misc: Primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event.
biography: Toni, a celebrated figure at Hirsala Golf, is renowned not only for his skill on the course but also for his pivotal role as the primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event. His dedication off the green has significantly contributed to the tournament's success and prestige over the years.

With 11 past appearances, Toni has become a familiar and respected competitor at the Hector Trophée. His deep understanding of the game and strategic prowess have led him to secure the coveted Hector Trophée on three occasions. In addition, he has distinguished himself as an exceptional individual player, earning the Victor Trophy twice, a testament to his consistent performance and competitive spirit.

Known for his meticulous planning and unwavering commitment, Toni brings a unique blend of leadership and sportsmanship to every tournament. As he prepares for his 12nd appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, anticipation builds to see how his experience and passion will shape his performance this year.
